getHtmlHeader

public java.lang.String getHtmlHeader()
Returns the header that is added to every results file and expected results file. The header includes an online reference to the diff.css file at googlecode.com. Having it as a fixed, static reference eases the comparison.

getHtmlFooter

public java.lang.String getHtmlFooter()

readContents

public java.lang.String readContents(java.io.File aFile)
                              throws java.io.IOException
Reads the contents of the given file into a String. The file contents is expected to be in UTF-8 encoding.

Parameters:
aFile -
Returns:
Throws:
